about_the_game:
Warning: this game contains occasional flashing images. If this poses a health risk to you, please proceed with caution.

Stuck in a dead-end town with plans that go nowhere, Jackie feels as if her life is doomed to stagnancy forever. Getting by with the support of a few similarly disenfranchised friends, she's resigned to her fate in a small town- until a chance encounter with a deadly life-form sets in motion a chain of events that will force her and her friends to adapt or become bug food.

With nowhere to go and less people to trust, Jackie will have to uncover the mysteries surrounding a seemingly unstoppable killing spree that covers her town, before she well and truly becomes stuck here forever.

Brood Year is a slasher-mystery horror with dynamic choices, changing story-lines and endings depending on the player's choices. Drawn in a dark pixel-punk style evocative of retro-adventure games, it is fully animated from scenes to character sprites. Written as a horror short film, multiple playthroughs are required to uncover all potential routes.

Features
  • Dynamic, immersive narrative choices that shape the game's narrative
  • Fully animated sprites and scenes
  • A roughly 1 hour playtime per playthrough
  • Lots of guts
  • Townsfolk of questionable intent

CW: This game contains multiple scenes of blood and gore, tobacco consumption, and swearing throughout.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains violent scenes depicting blood and gore, as well as frequent depictions of smoking.

name: Brood Year

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Graphics: Intel integrated graphics card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
